page.title: 19SUNDAY DINNER
page.content: Sunday dinner is the special family meal of the week.The family can eat together because very few people are at work on Sunday.We usually have dinner between two and three o'clock. My mum buys one big piece of pork,lamb or beef on Friday or Saturday. When she has cooked it on Sunday she will cut it into pieces for all the family to have with roast potatoes and vegetables.This is followed by a sweet,perhaps apple crumble and custard.If the weather is hot we may have our dinner in the early evening. Sunday is a family day.My sister prepares the table for dinner and after dinner I help to wash up.My auntie and uncle and cousin come to our house at about four-thirty or we may visit them.
